description: A three-hour meeting between freed hostages and Israel's leaders turned tense, observers say.
maintext: "I see [Israeli] bombings there, and you have no idea where the captives are. I was in a house surrounded by explosions. We slept in tunnels, and we feared not Hamas, but Israel might kill us, and then it would have been said, 'Hamas killed you,'" she said.
title: Israel hostages in Gaza: We have evidence their health worsening, say families
